an11.14:2.1.pli: “Kacci panāyaṁ, subhūti, saddho bhikkhu sudattassa upāsakassa putto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito sandissati saddhāpadānesū”ti?
an11.14:2.1.en: “Well, I hope this mendicant Saddha exhibits the outcomes of faith.”

an11.14:2.3.en: Let the Buddha to speak on the outcomes of faith.

an11.14:2.4.pli: Idānāhaṁ jānissāmi yadi vā ayaṁ bhikkhu sandissati saddhāpadānesu yadi vā no”ti.
an11.14:2.4.en: Now I will find out whether or not this mendicant Saddha exhibits the outcomes of faith.”

an11.14:15.2.pli: “yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā saddhassa saddhāpadānāni bhāsitāni, saṁvijjanti tāni imassa bhikkhuno, ayañca bhikkhu etesu sandissati.
an11.14:15.2.en: “Sir, the outcomes of faith for a faithful person that the Buddha speaks of are found in this mendicant; he does exhibit them.

an11.14:26.2.pli: Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā saddhassa saddhāpadānāni bhāsitāni, saṁvijjanti tāni imassa bhikkhuno, ayañca bhikkhu etesu sandissatī”ti.
an11.14:26.2.en: The outcomes of faith for a faithful person that the Buddha speaks of are found in this mendicant; he does exhibit them.”
